Scenario.description: Ukrainian Recon Forces Try to Stop a Russian Infiltration Towards Donetsk
US Paratroopers meet Russian Forces in urban combat. Better played as US vs AI or H2H.
To practice understanding in space the entire IN BN and to become familiarized with the general DOCTEMP dispositions

Title.battle_title: The Charge of the Heavy Brigade

Scenario.description: US Army and Russian armored forces clash head to head
huge battalion sized battle 3.5kms-3.5kms. ukr try to stop the flow west, h2h and h versus blue
US Mech company team launches attack against Russian mech unit holding vital junction and bridges. Play US Vs AI - Reinforcements x5
Ukrainian supply convoy attempting to break the blockade of a military base drives into one of several events that spark all out war.
Two Mountain Infantry Companies and a FAC Section are sent to guide ordnance from an airstrike onto a target bridge. Best played as Blue vs AI.
The Ukrainian 79th Air Assault Brigade in unity with National guard are liquidating enemy helicopter landing party in North Mykolaiv 464x416 (PBEM or Blue vs AI only)
A Russian mechanized force from the Kaliningrad Oblast attacks a light US force hastily deployed to Lithuania - Playable as Blue versus Red AI only
81 Reconnaissance Company delays 37 Gds MR Bde north of Barvinkove (Blue vs Red AI)
A beleaguered US Airborne Infantry force defends the Cherkasy area while awaiting critical supplies. Best played as US vs AI.
GRU's marine spetsnaz group one teams up with the SVR's mysterious 'Zaslon' unit behind enemy lines. The target is an abandoned seaside resort complex on the Black Sea.
A small US patrol is tasked with recovering a downed pilot in the vicinity of a Russian observation post. Best played Blue vs. AI.
Russian motorized infantry assaults town centre.
US Stryker Platoon vs Russian Motorized Infantry. Best played as Blue vs AI.
10 July. A UKR HQ, with a US Advisor Tm, finds itself cut off by a Russian breakthrough. Best played as Blue vs AI.
The Russian 9th Motor Rifle Brigade attempts to destroy fleeing Ukrainian forces falling back across the Vorskla river. Best played as Red vs. AI.
American Paratroopers seize a Grain Elevator in Southern Ukraine. BLUFOR vs AI only. v1.1
US Stryker Company Team meets the first echelon of a Russian Motorized Rifle Battalion. Best played as Blue vs AI.
A small meeting between mechanized platoons in the small town Kumeiky. Playable either side and any style.
Russian advance after a recent breakthrough in the Kirovohrad-Kremenchuk region. Best played as Rus vs AI or H2H.
6th september 2022 year. The Ukrainian counteroffensive has began, try to break throught the enemy line (PBEM or Blue vs Red AI)
US and Russian forces clash in a "quiet" rear area
A US Stryker Troop, deployed in a Forward Operating Base, fights Russian backed Separatists. Blue vs AI only. Elite or Iron only. Map 2416 x 3008.
US Air Assault troops keep an important MSR clear of Russian patrols. BLUFOR vs AI only
Russian attack on Ukrainian checkpoint on the outskirts of Kharkiv. Best played as Rus vs AI or H2H.
US forces on night patrol stumble upon a Russian AAA battery.
US Mech company team launches attack against Russian mech unit holding vital junction and bridges. Play US Vs AI; H2H; Rus Vs AI
Seal Team 6 assaults a prison while an infantry platoon is tasked with clearing the road to extraction
The Ukrainian 110th Mechanized Brigade holding the second line of defence north of Avdiivka (Blue vs Red only)
Ambush Battle Drill Tutorial. Helps practice the conceptual undertanding of ambush elements and sequence.
Aug 10, 2017: TF Warhorse conducts a deliberate attack to penetrate the enemy MLR. H2H; Experienced player reccomended BLU
Elements of a Russian Motorized Tactical Group attacks to clear out Ukrainian and US Defenders
14th July 2017 Russian armoured spearheads drive west looking to surround Kiev. Play as Blue vs AI - Reinforcements x7
Ukrainian Special Forces attack a Russin Hq and Supply Depot UKR vs Ai only

Title.battle_title: CMBS Lights, Camera & Action. The Clash

Scenario.description: Russian forces have surrounded some Blue force troops and a Blue counter attack is launched. Best played as HTH, Red and Blue have AI plans
Combined force of US and Partner elements attacks Threat Forces
US mechanized infantry platoon sweeps away Russian rearguard troops. Play Blue vs. AI ONLY.
A US LRS Platoon bringing in for debrief a double spy, faces a Russian attack while waiting for extraction in a small village behind enemy lines
A Ukrainian BMP Company Task Force meets a Russian BMP Company Task Force
US Mechanized Company Team from the 1st Cavalry Brigade outflanks a Russian Battalion defending three small towns. Best played as US vs AI.
The Ukrainian 63rd Mechanized Brigade is crossing the Ingulets river and trying to take Lozove village. Size 1312x1008(PBEM or Blue vs AI only)
A US patrol is tasked with searching the remains of a destroyed RUS Battle Group HQ. Best played as Blue versus AI.
The remnatsof UKR Bn (92 Brig.) hold back Russian BTG (423 Reg.) (Blue vs AI only)
A US Army infantry battalion must hold againt a russian attack
Mechanized forces clash near a railroad bridge. Best played H2H but works also against AI on either side (Russian side being a tad easier).
Ukrainian 28th Mechanized brigade storms enemy positions near Kurdyumivka(Blue vs Red only)
15th July 2017 US Armored combat teams launch an attack to seize vital bridge crossings defended by Russian mechanised forces.
Russians seperatist makes one last attempt to capture Debaltseve before an impending ceasefire. Mapsize 1120 X 640 playable as Seperatists (RED) only. 80 turns
US Airborne Infantry defends against Russian Motorized Infantry supported by armor
A small Russian armored combat recce patrol launches a pre-dawn raid behind UKR lines to destroy UKR rear area positions.
US Scouts take a wrong turn - into the path of Russian armor. Blue vs AI ONLY, real time recommended.
Russian Mechanised Infantry attack the town of Zhorstokyy. Best played as Blue vs AI.
very fictional. blue versus red or h2h. blue mechanised forces assault a city. large map so room for manoeuvre. 5x red ai plans so some replayability
Commando unit is tasked with rescuing POW held in the Castle Keep. Mech Units must clear the road juntion and hold before the ORF makes it's presence know
1st Cavalry Division attempts to parry a Russian thrust.
Russian recon elements bump into an adhoc group of American troops. REDFOR vs. AI only.
A Ukranian battle group seeks to clear a key hill in order to establish an observation post within their next phase area.
US Strykers vs RUS BTR-82As, 0500 Hours
A US Styker platoon siezes an objective in support of the main effort. Best played as Blue vs AI.
Militia of the Donetsk People's Republic with assistance from Russian Special Forces conduct a dawn raid on a village west of Slovyansk. Play as Blue, Red or H2H.
A US infantry platoon attacks a Russian mortar position near a gas station. Best played Blue vs. AI.
14th July 2017 Russian armoured spearheads drive west looking to surround Kiev. US armored units advance to contact along HWY P32. Best played as Blue vs AI.
Russian and Ukrainian mechanized companies face off on equal terms in this meeting engagement.
An air precision strike must preceed a sweep to search for and gather intel (Play only Blue Vs Red AI)
Ukrainian BMP and Russian BMP equipped forces clash head to head
A Combined JSOC and UKR Spetznaz force conducts a Direct Action Raid behind enemy lines (Play as NATO only)
Seal Team Six raids an industrial compound guarded by veteran Russian reccon troops
